topic.title: Local Backup & Restore
topic.shortdesc: Schedule auto backup on YMP web interface to ensure an alternative option in case of any failure of the YMP system and customers' PBXs.

body.section:
By default, Backup Schedule is enabled on YMP, and the system automatically creates a backup file stored in the system at midnight every day.
You can adjust the backup schedule settings on YMP, but do NOT disable Backup Schedule feature.

section.title: Backup Data
section.p: YMP supports for backing up the following data:

ul.li: Voicemail, one-touch recordings, and CDRs of PBXs

section.title: Scenarios
section.p: When the YMP web interface is accessible, the local backup files are applied for the following scenarios:

li.p: When your customer's PBX data is abnormal or the PBX data is lost, you can quickly restore an individual PBX backup for the customer's PBX.

p.xref: How to restore a customer's PBX?

li.p: When the data loss or data error occurs in the YMP system or in all the customers' PBXs, you can restore the entire YMP backup to fix this issue.

p.xref: How to restore the YMP system?
